summary.body: I'm looking at covering Health Clubs and Gyms in close proximity to the Barbican in the next issue of Barbican Life.  Those I'm looking at are:  Champneys, Holmes Place Barbican, Holmes Place Moorgate, Lambs Club (Fitness Exchange), LA Fitness, Fitness First and the YMCA.  Comments appreciated as long as they don't stimulate a thread like the long running one - 'The Hell that is Holmes Place'!  Interested in facilities, service, pricing etc.  Obviously I'm asking the health clubs themselves to send in photographs and details on their services, but users comments would also be appreciated and may be used anonymously.
summary.subject: Health Clubs etc.

summary.body: Having entered one of those 5k charity runs (seemed like a good idea at the time....) I am now faced with the unpleasant task of training. finding treadmills terminally dull even with the benefit of pumping tunes in my ears, i have just realised the benefits of the perimeter highwalk (including round by museum of london) as a running route. does anyone know how far this is so i can work out how many laps is the equivalent to 5k?  need to learn to pace to myself before i collapse in a beetroot-faced heap......
summary.subject: How long is the highwalk?

summary.body: Hello, I wanted to see if any other parents are missing not being able to take their kids to the pool at the weekend.  I have complained to the management a couple of times about reinstating a lifeguard, but they say the problem is they're not able to find a lifeguard that will only work for a couple of hours a day. I think if there's enough of us that rally around and push for it, Virgin will make more of an effort to find somebody/have to increase the wage to make it more of an attractive offer.   I know we're able to use the faciltiies at the Islington site but with all the baggage, inflatables etc. it's just another hike I want to avoid at the weekend - in the time we save we might even be able to squeeze in the luxury of a few Sunday papers. Oh the crazy, glamorous life we parents lead! Here's hoping! Best, Sam
summary.subject: No Lifeguard for Children at Virgin Barbican Pool

summary.body: Desperately looking for an evening yoga class near here. Iyengar preferably. But  beggars can't be chosers - any type of yoga would do.

summary.body: Can anyone recommend a good printing company ? Our bowls club is celebrating its centenery this year (see previous postings) and a local historian has compiled a history which we hope to turn into a brochure / booklet to give as a gift to members and opposition teams. Any help appreciated.
summary.subject: Printers.

summary.body: This season is the Centenery of Southwark Park Bowling Club, Jamaica Road, Rotherhithe, SE16. We hope to start this historic season on Sunday 19th April and we are always on the lookout for new and experienced players.Coaching would be available. Lawn Bowls is a sport that men and women can play on an equal basis, and despite the image of being an "Old Man's Sport" this is not always the case as can be seen on T.V.coverage. Opening times are Mon-Fri. 2-4pm                     Plus Tues & Thurs 6-8pm                            Sat & Sun.2-4pm. If you would like more information please do not hesitate to pm me.
summary.subject: Southwark Park Bowling Club - Centenery.
